languages.text: "И снова "Лорд-капитан". Вы же знаете, что можете обращаться ко мне по имени?"

traits.locale_text: "И снова "Лорд-капитан". Вы же знаете, что можете обращаться ко мне по имени?"

languages.text: "I am 'Lord Captain' once again, I see. Surely you know that you may call me by my name?"
languages.original_text: "И снова "Лорд-капитан". Вы же знаете, что можете обращаться ко мне по имени?"

traits.locale_text: "And once again, it is 'Lord Captain.' Surely you know that you may call me by my name?"
"And once again, it is 'Lord Captain.' Surely you know that you may call me by my name?"
"I am 'Lord Captain' once again, I see. Surely you know that you may call me by my name?"
"I am 'Lord Captain' once again, I see. Surely you know that you may call me by my name?"
"I am 'Lord Captain' once again, I see. Surely you know that you may call me by my name?"

languages.text: “好吧，又变成‘舰长大人’了。我不是说过你可以直呼我的名字吗？”
languages.original_text: "I am 'Lord Captain' once again, I see. Surely you know that you may call me by my name?"

traits.locale_text: “好吧，又变成‘舰长大人’了。我不是说过你可以直呼我的名字吗？”

languages.text: "Ah, ich bin also wieder 'Lord Captain'. Ihr wisst doch gewiss, dass Ihr mich beim Vornamen nennen könnt?"
languages.original_text: "I am 'Lord Captain' once again, I see. Surely you know that you may call me by my name?"

traits.locale_text: "Ah, ich bin also wieder 'Lord Captain'. Ihr wisst doch gewiss, dass Ihr mich beim Vornamen nennen könnt?"

languages.text: « Encore ce "{mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}". Ne vous ai-je pas dit que vous pouviez m'appeler par mon nom ? »
languages.original_text: "I am 'Lord Captain' once again, I see. Surely you know that you may call me by my name?"

traits.locale_text: « Encore ce "{mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}". Ne vous ai-je pas dit que vous pouviez m'appeler par mon nom ? »

languages.text: «Por lo que veo vuelvo a ser "Lord Capitán". Sabe que puede llamarme por mi nombre».
languages.original_text: "I am 'Lord Captain' once again, I see. Surely you know that you may call me by my name?"

traits.locale_text: «Por lo que veo vuelvo a ser "Lord Capitán". Sabe que puede llamarme por mi nombre».

languages.text: 「また『ロード・キャプテン』か。なるほど。私を、名前で呼んでくれても良いのだが？」
languages.original_text: "I am 'Lord Captain' once again, I see. Surely you know that you may call me by my name?"

traits.locale_text: 「また『ロード・キャプテン』か。なるほど。私を、名前で呼んでくれても良いのだが？」

languages.text: "Yine 'Lord Kaptan' olmuşum bakıyorum. Bana ismimle de hitap edebilirsin, biliyorsun."
languages.original_text: "I am 'Lord Captain' once again, I see. Surely you know that you may call me by my name?"
